config.sourceFolder.description: Source folder path, used to store the last selected translation folder path
config.destFolders.description: Translation target folder configuration, multiple target folders and their corresponding target languages can be specified
config.translationIntervalDays.descripti: Translation interval days, if the target file exists and has been translated within this number of days, it will be skipped
config.ignoreTranslationExtensions.descr: List of text file extensions that do not need to be translated, the files will be directly copied to the destination folder
config.ignorePaths.description: List of ignored path patterns, using wildcards, the files will not be copied to the destination folder
config.systemPrompts.description: System prompt array, used to guide the translation process, multiple system prompts can be added
config.userPrompts.description: User-defined prompt array, these prompts will be added after the system prompts during the translation process
config.segmentationMarkers.description: Segmentation markers configured by file type, supporting regular expressions
config.destFiles.description: Target files configuration for file translation
config.enableMetrics.description: Enable or disable sending anonymous usage metrics to help improve the extension
